name: 3D Chess
summary:
3D Chess is a one or two player, mouse controlled game.

It features eleven computer opponents with various skill levels. traditional, modern, Egyptian, interstellar, and medieval chess sets and a skinnable interface. The game also has a Blitz Mode, three tutorial modes and a Chess Strategy Guide.

Versions of this game with reduced functionality were included in some eGames' compilations such as Card & Board Games Deluxe Suite 2.
